summary: An FBI email from September 2019 discusses attempts to identify two females from provided names: Caroline Stanbury Habib and Abigail King. The email includes research findings, a photo attachment, and a related encounter record for Caroline Habib from June 2019.

persons.name: Caroline Stanbury Habib
persons.context: Identified by the FBI from a list of names; research indicates she is married to Cem Habib. An encounter record from June 2019 is attached.

persons.name: Cem Habib
persons.context: Mentioned as the spouse of Caroline Stanbury Habib in the open-source article referenced by the FBI.

persons.name: Abigail King
persons.context: A name provided for identification; initial FBI searches returned negative results, but a link to an article mentioning 'Adela King' in connection with Ghislaine Maxwell was found.

persons.name: Adela King
persons.context: Name found in an open-source article from The Sun (UK) in connection with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, referenced during the search for Abigail King.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in an article link found during the search for Abigail King, connecting her to Jeffrey Epstein and Adela King.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Implicitly referenced as the central figure in the case; mentioned by association in the article link about Ghislaine Maxwell and Adela King.

connections.description: Identified as married couple in the open-source article referenced by the FBI.
Linked in a news article discussing an alleged threesome with Jeffrey Epstein at Claridge's hotel.
Well-documented association as accomplices; referenced together in the article about Adela King.

events.title: Encounter record for Caroline Habib
events.description: An encounter record indicates Caroline Habib was encountered on this date, though the context and location are not specified in the provided text.

events.title: FBI email regarding identification efforts
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails attempting to identify individuals named Caroline Stanbury Habib and Abigail King, sharing research and an encounter record.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively attempting to identify individuals named 'Caroline Stanbury Habib' and 'Abigail King' in September 2019 as part of the Epstein investigation.
An encounter record shows Caroline Habib was encountered by authorities on June 18, 2019.
Searches for 'Abigail King' led to an article referencing 'Adela King' and an alleged threesome with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein at Claridge's hotel.
The document demonstrates the FBI's use of open-source intelligence (OSINT) and media reports to identify potential persons of interest.
